Name: Dana Thompson

Racial Identity: African-American  

Dana Thompson is an experienced yoga instructor who finds joy in both the tranquility of yoga and the adrenaline rush of mountain biking. - Listening to jazz concerts in the park  
- Cooking plant-based meals and experimenting with new recipes

- Writing poetry inspired by nature and personal experiences  

**Things Dana Dislikes:**
